Title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
Writer: Leon Uris (screenplay), George Scullin (suggested by an article by)
Actors: Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Rhonda Fleming, Jo Van Fleet
Plot: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.
